Params: {3: "The chaotic barrage of cannon fire finally comes to a halt, and Karenina's frame softly collapses on her weapon. Her fingertips still twirling with a halo of energy in pale violet."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, Karenina's M.I.N.D. will need to be manually rebooted.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Wait, if we don't solve her issue before rebooting, it'll all just be the same as before.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Understood... That strange light seething out of herâ€”how should we deal with it?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'It looks like some form of energy.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Don't touch it! I accessed Karenina's logs... She met Kamui.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Her M.I.N.D. went into an infinite loop in the middle of the fight.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'From the visual image extracted from the logs... this command function is visual imagery saving, she must have saved something in an emergency...', 4: '3'}
{3: '(Liv manipulates the glowing particles in the air into an image.)'}
{3: "(In the image, a purplish fluid-like something is attached to Kamui's weapon and his left shoulder.)"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Kamui must have left us for this...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'No, he\'s still on the move. If this is the "last resort," then he\'ll already have returned to you.', 4: '1'}
